text:
i have written a program in servlet which uploads the image to a particular 
directory. the program is running fine on java web server 1.1.3 or 2.0 but in 
case of tomcat3.2.1 whenever i run the program and try to upload the image 
below 10 kb it works fine but for more than 10 kb error comes showing "this 
page cannot be displayed".(ofcourse i have made the max. buffer size to be 10 
kb and if it exceeds the error page i have made must get displayed as in case 
of java web server, but in tomcat i'm not getting this.)no error logs are being 
generated.
creator: savinash_in@yahoo.com

text:
Try against 3.3. If it still doesn't work, send code to reproduce it 
( like the servlet you use or a simplified version that can reproduce the bug ).
Are you using standalone tomcat ?
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com

text: Not enough data, can't reproduce it in 3.3.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
